trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Please enter a number between 0 and 31:] and wait set [number v] to (answer) set [bit value v] to [32] set [cards v] to [] repeat until <(bit value) = [1]> set [bit value v] to ((bit value) / (2)) if <<(number) > (bit value)> or <(number) = (bit value)>> then set [cards v] to (join (cards) [W]) set [number v] to ((number) - (bit value)) else set [cards v] to (join (cards) [B]) end end say (join (join (join [The binary representation for the number ] (answer)) [ is ]) (cards))
